attributes.action: reduce parking fees,restrictions and fines in london
attributes.additional_details: soon we will not be able to park anywhere in london for free or cheaply parking restrictions need to be relaxed and also fees and fines need to be reduced i mean whats the point of having a car these days this government has declared war on the motorist

rejection.details: Parking fees are a matter for the relevant local highway authority (London boroughs in this case).
